content:
hi guys I was working on my application to help me analyze long log files for couple of months. I think core functionality is ready, so I want to switch to new project (don't worry Roc will be used as well ). I plan to use peek app at my work, so I will spend some time on critical issues, like bugs and essential features. other then that I consider this project exiting strict development phase.

https://github.com/salarii/peek
